data.message: Facebook I'm curious as to why my comment was just deleted in regards to an account restriction placed against mine?

replies.message: Again, I will state, for three days I have tried the process to appeal the restriction that you include with your notification sent out that my account had been placed on a restriction. I can count at least 10 "Selling" groups with pages in my area. I attempted to sell a personal belonging on them and in turn received an unnecessary restriction that now prevents me from posting in or joining groups. I am currently the creator /administrator of a support group for moms in my area and I cannot even partake in my group due to this restriction. I would GREATLY appreciate some assistance in this matter as my appeals are going nowhere. Thank you!
Hey Candace. You may have over-used a feature, even if you didn't mean to. Blocks are temporary and can last up to a few days. Hold tight! -Kevin
